job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setup 64b # setup gcc451 set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set dir = `dirname $evtsFile`; set logFile = ${file}_${f}B.log # set output = ${file}.event.root set output = ${file}_${f}.event.root if ( -r $output) exit 0; root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"P2010a,pmdReco,btof,BEmcChkStat,Corr4,alignment,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags,-hitfilt","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
